clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right to prohibit or remove, without prior notice, any content that, in our sole judgment and discretion, interferes with that goal.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.
clauses.clause_text: You may request that we remove your Personal Information by contacting us, with the understanding that we may maintain an archive or back-up of the information not on the Website.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text:
WikiTree may also use Facebook features and tools, including pixel tags added to WikiTree, that allow data about actions of visitors to be sent to Facebook.
Facebook’s use of such data is governed by Facebook’s Data Use Policy.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "In certain circumstances, if we believe it is reasonably necessary, we may release specific information about you or your account to comply with any valid legal process such as a search warrant, subpoena, statute, or court order, or in other special cases, such as an attempted breach of WikiTree security, without notice to you."

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: Your continued use of WikiTree following the posting of changes to these terms will mean you accept these changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text:
These cookies don't hold any Personal Information.
They are just flags or simple bits of data that manipulate how the website looks and acts.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Obtain a copy of the Personal Information about you.
This is best done with a GEDCOM export since it creates a portable file that can be imported into almost any major genealogy program or website.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: By registering and providing your e-mail address, you consent to us communicating with you by e-mail, including without limitation, to provide you notice of any security breach in lieu of other written notification.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text: In certain circumstances, if we believe it is reasonably necessary, we may release specific information about you or your account to comply with any valid legal process such as a search warrant, subpoena, statute, or court order

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
Express any concern you have about our use of your Personal Information.

You can e-mail info@wikitree.com for help with any of the above.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Any company performing services on our behalf will be subject to contractual obligations governing data protection that adhere to the policies contained herein and applicable laws. In addition, we will provide these companies only with the information they need to deliver the services, and, where applicable, such companies will be contractually prohibited from using that information for any other purpose.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
clauses.description: You have the right to send a counter-notice to the service if you believe the content that was removed wasn't infringing any copyright.
clauses.clause_text: If you believe in good faith that a notice of copyright infringement has been wrongly filed against you, the DMCA permits you to send us a counter-notice. Notices and counter-notices must meet statutory requirements imposed by the DMCA. One place to find more information is the U.S. Copyright Office web site, currently located at http://www.loc.gov/copyright/. We suggest that you consult your legal advisor before filing a notice or counter-notice.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text:
This Agreement shall remain in full force and effect while you use the Website or are a Member.
You may terminate your Membership at any time, for any reason, by following the instructions on the Member's Account Settings page.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Updated: 25 May 2018

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
clauses.description:
You are responsible for your use of the service. If a claim arises related to that use, you agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless.
If users are also required to defend the service, see Case 146 instead.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: You agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
clauses.clause_text: Survival. Sections 5, 7 - 13 and 14 - 17 shall survive any termination of these Terms.

case.text: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The Website is for non-commercial, personal use only.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
clauses.clause_text: You agree not to use or launch any automated system, including without limitation, "robots," "spiders," or "offline readers," that accesses the Website in a manner that sends more request messages to our servers in a given period of time than a human can reasonably produce in the same period by using a conventional on-line web browser.

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: THE WEBSITE, THE MATERIALS IT CONTAINS, AND ANY INTERESTING.COM PRODUCTS OR SERVICES PROVIDED ON OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SITE ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS, "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: you are 13 years of age or older.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: your use of the Website does not violate any applicable law or regulation.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
If you believe in good faith that items, information or other materials appearing on the Website infringes your copyright, you (or your agent) may send Interesting.com's Designated Agent a notice requesting that the item, information or material be removed, or access to it blocked.

You can contact Interesting.com's Designated Agent at: Chris Whitten, Interesting.com, Inc., 49 Bramblebush Road, Croton on Hudson, NY 10520, info-at-wikitree-dot-com (remove the hyphens and convert "at" to "@" and "dot" to ".").

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:

          This is my first time i visit here and I found so many interesting stuff in your blog especially it's discussion, thank you. 印度醫療簽證

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: We hire other companies to provide services on our behalf.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
